data.title: Hasan Ma'juni
data.meta_description: Mohammad Hassan Madjooni is Iranian an television actor and theater director born in Zanjan, Iran. He is a graduate of "Theatrical Literature". Hassan Mahjuni is also the head of the Liu Theater Group. He has also starred in "The Traveler" series directed by Rambod Javan, as well as the candlelight series directed by Soroush Sehat. He was nominated for Best Actor in the Twentieth Century of Iranian Cinema for his role in The Pig, directed by Mani Haghighi.
data.text:
IMDb

Mohammad Hassan Madjooni is Iranian an television actor and theater director born in Zanjan, Iran. He is a graduate of "Theatrical Literature". Hassan Mahjuni is also the head of the Liu Theater Group. He has also starred in "The Traveler" series directed by Rambod Javan, as well as the candlelight series directed by Soroush Sehat. He was nominated for Best Actor in the Twentieth Century of Iranian Cinema for his role in The Pig, directed by Mani Haghighi.
